item.title: Patching Gaps in the CIS Windows 11 Benchmark - BitLocker
item.description: Everyone loves a security baseline, and with the imminent move to Windows 11 for everyone, the Center for Internet Security released version 3.0.1 of their benchmark, including a build kit for Microsoft Intune, but what does it break for BitLocker encryption?
